description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is the most successful film franchise to date. Of course, that doesn’t mean there aren’t critics, and many of those critics include Hollywood’s biggest players. Jamie Lee Curtis shared such criticisms against Marvel’s latest phase, calling it outright “bad,” but now she’s trying to issue an apology to Marvel Studios. As [...]

The post Jamie Lee Curtis Offers Apology To Marvel After Calling Current MCU Phase “Bad” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Jamie Lee Curtis Offers Apology To Marvel After Calling Current MCU Phase “Bad”
